What I focus on day-to-day.

üéØCore Focus

I explore robust and adaptive vision models, especially continual test-time adaptation, domain shift robustness, and parameter-efficient tuning.

üß™Working Style

I enjoy combining theory, large-scale experiments, and systems implementation, from adapter-based vision models to C/LLVM compilers and OS kernels.
